text: Julian Holloway (24 June 1944 â€“ 16 February 2025) was a British actor. He voiced Death in the animated series Regular Show. He also played Paterson on Doctor Who. His father was actor Stanley Holloway. Holloway was in a relationship with Tessa Dahl, the daughter of author Roald Dahl. They had one daughter, Sophie Dahl. Holloway died in Bournemouth, Dorset on 16 February 2025 from a respiratory tract infection at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2025 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:British voice actors Category:Actors from Oxfordshire Category:Deaths from respiratory tract infection
title: Julian Holloway
